text: Gianluigi Colalucci (24 December 1929 â€“ 28 March 2021) was an Italian Master Restorer and academic. He is best known for being the chief restorer of the Sistine Chapel in the Vatican City from 1980 to 1994. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Italian artists
title: Gianluigi Colalucci
